channel.title: /var/run/tor/control broken symlink
channel.description:
I tried to connect OnionShare with socket file option, but it said "Can't connect to the Tor controller using socket file /var/run/tor/control."
Then I tried to see the content inside tor/control by sudoedit and it says No such device or address. But since I can see it exist in GUI File Manager, I tried ls -l /var/run/tor/ result being, total 8 srw-rw-rw- 1 debian-tor debian-tor 0 Apr 11 04:19 control -rw-r----- 1 debian-tor debian-tor 32 Apr 11 04:21 control.authcookie -rw-r----- 1 debian-tor debian-tor 32 Apr 11 04:21 control_auth_cookie srw-rw-rw- 1 debian-tor debian-tor 0 Apr 11 04:19 socks while "control" and "socks" are coloured purple (orphan symlink).
How do I restore broken symlink to use OnionShare properly?
